tool_description: Detects faces in images and analyzes facial attributes relevant to content moderation including age estimation and emotion detection.

image_path.description: Path to the image file to analyze

detect_age.description: Whether to estimate age of detected faces

min_face_size.description: Minimum face size in pixels for detection

max_faces.description: Maximum number of faces to analyze

error_messages: Image not readable: Cannot access or read the specified image file.
Invalid face size: min_face_size must be between 20 and 200 pixels.
Invalid max faces: max_faces must be between 1 and 50.
Face detection failed: Unable to process image for face detection. Check image quality and format.
Analysis error: Face attribute analysis failed. Image may be too low quality.
usage: Provide image_path and configure which facial attributes to analyze. Use detect_age for age-restricted content policies and detect_emotions for context understanding.

faces_detected.description: Number of faces found in the image

estimated_ages.description: Estimated ages for each detected face

dominant_emotions.description: Primary emotion detected for each face

minor_present.description: Whether any face appears to be under 18 years old

face_analysis_summary.description: Summary of face analysis results and potential concerns
